HERE WE GO: RB Salzburg talent Leon Lalić joins Man City

Football Emily · 24/08/2023 · Man City

Excl: RB Salzburg talent Leon Lalić joins Man City/City Group, here we go

It’s the first deal ever from RB Salzburg to City Group — historical for 2006-born midfielder 

Lalić will initially join side Lommel.

David Fernandez’s team followed Lalić for more than 2 years

The 17-year-old international has recently featured at the Under-17 Euros, starting all three in Hungary for Mladi Vatreni, including a 70-minute game against England before Croatia were knocked out of the group stage.

Premier League hegemon and recent treble winners, Manchester City have their eyes on another Croatian talent this summer after the club are reported to have topped the player's waiting list. international wing U17 Leon Lalić .

The 17-year-old recently started at the Under-17 Euros, starting all three games in Hungary for Mladi Vatreni, including playing 70 minutes against England before Croatia were knocked out of the group stage.

According to football insider Fabrizio Romano, Man City is now said to be Lalić's preferred destination despite considerable interest from a range of clubs across the continent, with a decision poised to be made in the immediate future. .
